scripts.typecheck: bunx tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx tsc -p services/anchor/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx tsc -p services/orbit/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.test: bun test src/lib/**/*.test.ts && python -m pytest -q services/control-plane/tests && bun --cwd services/orbit test
scripts.ci:local: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bunx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name codex-remote --branch main
scripts.migrate: bunx wrangler d1 migrations apply codex-remote --remote
